sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Target, DollarSign, CheckCircle, Calendar } from 'lucide-react'; const Overview = ({ goals }) => { const totalGoals = goals.length; const totalSaved = goals.reduce((sum, goal) => sum + goal.savedAmount, 0); const completedGoals = goals.filter(goal => goal.savedAmount >= goal.targetAmount).length; return (

Total Goals

{totalGoals}

Total Saved

${totalSaved.toLocaleString()}

Completed

{completedGoals}

In Progress

{totalGoals - completedGoals}

); }; export default Overview;
